description: The 'Program.cs' file sets up a web API for managing personal notes using ASP.NET Core minimal APIs. It configures services, middleware, and endpoints for CRUD operations on notes, including Swagger/OpenAPI documentation and CORS policy.

methods.name: CreateNote
methods.description: Creates a new note after validating the request body and returns the created note with a 201 status code.

methods.name: ListNotes
methods.description: Returns all existing notes ordered by most recently updated first.

methods.name: GetNote
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its GUID. Returns 404 if not found.

methods.name: UpdateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note after validating the request body. Returns the updated note or 404 if not found.

methods.name: DeleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its GUID. Returns 204 on success or 404 if not found.
